data.eml:eml: New record of the genus Caputanurina Lee, 1983 (Collembola: Neanuridae) from China, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, Donghui, Yin, Wenying (2007): New record of the genus Caputanurina Lee, 1983 (Collembola: Neanuridae) from China, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 1411: 43-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175604
